p: In a separate experiment, to validate the micro-PRNT on blood meals from mosquitoes that had fed directly on vertebrate hosts, Ae. notoscriptus were fed on the exposed arms of RRV seropositive and seronegative human volunteers (previously confirmed by conventional PRNT) for a period of 15 min. Fully engorged mosquitoes were selected for analysis, maintained and harvested as above. Remnant blood could be observed in mosquito abdomens until 60 hours ( Fig 1).
